page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: Most people living within our block live in{terraced houses}built from the traditional{Belsay stone.}These houses are found within the village itself. The rest of the inhabitants live in {cottages}or former{farmhouses}also built from Belsay stone. The accommodation was once entirely owned by the Middleton family but many houses are now owner-occupied. There has not been any recent building within the area. The people whom we talked to said that their houses were between{70 and 200 years {old.}However there has been some modernisation of the existing buildings as many people have installed central heating.
